name: King Bedhead's Shooting Gallery
description:
SHOOT THE TARGETS!!! (ssb  voice)

I did the 7dFPS 2022 challenge and kind of sort of succeeded. There are many props I would like to add some animation to, and it would be cool to have a scoring system, so maybe I will update this. But for now, I'm just happy that I made collision that works relatively consistently - turns out the secret is not making the bullets too fast.
